summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Water Department authorizing the sale to Ronald C. Burnett of timber cutting rights on certain City lands (east one-half of Section 16, Township 22 North, Range 7 East, W.M.) in the Cedar River Watershed for a consideration to be paid in the form of a conveyance to the City of certain real property located within said watershed in the southeast one-quarter of the southeast one-quarter of the northwest one-quarter of Section 18, Township 22 North, Range 7 East, W.M. and authorizing execution of a Timber Sale Agreement in such connection.
